item.description:
Can you sing, play an instrument, or have a special talent you would like to perform?

This is our very own open mic night.  It's the last one we're going to do, so don't miss out on a fun night of entertaining your fellow meetup members. Guests are welcome to this event.

There is no charge.  Just come and have some fun!

Acts begin at 6 pm, come early to socialize and get a java and/or a bite to eat. The cafe has lots of great food from lattes, to sandwiches, to salads, to pastries, etc. You can bring your food and beverage purchases into the event room.

Open Mic ends at 8:30 pm and the store closes at 9 pm.
item.how_to_find_us: Event room towards the back of the store.
item.name: Open Mic Night at Tatnuck in Westboro
